title: Jack Henry Cleanse+ Hair Shampoo | All Hair Types - Premium, Natural, Organic - Made in USA - 10 Ounces
descriptions:
Jack Henry Cleanse+ Hair Shampoo

Description:
Meet your new daily essential for a healthier scalp and fuller-looking hair. Jack Henry Cleanse+ is a premium, natural, and organic shampoo crafted for all hair types. Formulated to purify and balance the scalp without stripping or drying, it leaves hair softer, cleaner, and noticeably more voluminous after every wash.

Key Benefits:
- Purifies and balances hair and scalp
- Leaves hair softer and fuller
- Cleans deeply without residue
- Non-stripping and non-drying for everyday use

Clean Formula:
- Natural, organic ingredients
- Free from harmful chemicals and preservatives
- Gentle enough for daily use

Details:
- Size: 10 ounces
- Origin: Made in USA
- Suitable for: All hair types
- Quality: Premium

How to Use:
Massage a small amount into wet hair and scalp, work into a lather, then rinse thoroughly. Use daily or as needed.

Why You’ll Love It:
A minimalist, clean formula that respects your hair’s natural balance while delivering a deep, refreshing cleanse—no harsh additives, just performance you can feel.
